column4: I am using ubuntu edgy and I have a canon PIXMA iP5200 R printer
I have no linux-drivers for my canon-printer
if there are window drivers - yes
chose a file system, put it on your device
and how can i put a file-system on my device?
what file system do you want ?
i want to use vfat again
what command did you use to format the drive (exactly please)
please mount it and show me the output of df -h in a pastebin and then show me fdisk -l /dev/sdb
apt-get removes / installs what you tell it to
that will only remove uneeded packages
